name: Groceries Please
description:
Sorry HMTL/WebGL  is disabled, it was too complex for many browser and gave a poor experience

AN ADRENALINE RUSH PAID HOURLY

As the newest employee in a soul-draining supermarket, your duty is to ring up the massive pile of items that will continue to appear every ten seconds.  The customers won't wait for you to catch up.  Pick up items and give them a scan to keep things moving along smoothly!

MAYHEM IN AISLE 9

Scan in a variety of items, ranging from collectibles and essentials to blatant developer product advertisements. Shapes and sizes may vary. Deal with broken barcodes, scanner malfunction, angry customers. 

Watch your conveyor belt carefully!  If you fail to keep your line moving, you'll be fired on the spot.

MINIMUM WAGE WAR ON THE COMMUNITY

*Groceries, Please* has a working leaderboard for fellow employees to compete for worker competence.  May the high scores fly!

Controls 

- WASD - Arrow Keys: rotating items

- Mouse move: moving the hand

- Left click on item: move it to scan location

- Left click on scanner: take scanner in hand

- Left click with scanner in hand: scan barcode

- Click on keyboard to enter barcode number manually in case of broken barcode

- Push the red button in case of angry customer

- Shake the scanner when the scanner malfunction

Programs

- 3D models: Blender

- 3D Tobugis Toys: Blockbench 

- 2D design/graphics: Krita 

- Game made by Godot Engine

- Game music: Bitwig Studio

- Sound Edition: Audacity

P.S: We will be playing lots of game entries this time and stream live on twitch. We will be happy to play your game. Come joins us live and submit your game for us to play on https://www.twitch.tv/tobugis!

Change Log

The patch 1.1 version is the same game as the original version with some quality of life update and mini bug fixes:

  • changed the quit button location to prevent quitting by mistake
  • corrected a sound effect
  • mini game balance to give a better experience to new players
  • improved UI (button feedback on mouse over, text)
  • prevent submitting negative score to the leaderboard
